original_title: Playboy: No Boys Allowed 3 Sweet Sensations
overview: Just when you thought you'd witnessed every satisfying moment, Playboy went back into the film vault to uncover even more scenes of the hottest girl-girl action yet! Once again Playboy unleashes a gorgeous girls-only cast who push the limits - and all the right buttons - in these scorching scenarios. But it doesn't end there! The naughtiness continues with a sizzler featuring top adult stars Janine, Raylene and Devon that you're sure to enjoy again and again!
title: Playboy: No Boys Allowed 3 Sweet Sensations
